All cases

This shows the all cases view for elastic search.

Case lists

  • 8(a)
  • MPP - though we didn't talk to anyone from MPP.
  • WOSB

These lists can be accessed via the tabs in the prototype.

New components and CSS updates included

  • Forms – These updates include the pattern for an indefinite checkbox
  • Questionnaire — There's a small version of the follow-up fields component. This modifier class helps the pattern’s visual presentation in a narrow column.
  • Faceting
  • Font size
  • Separators
  • Text alignment

Guidance

  • All facets should append a URL parameter so BOS can bookmark queries
  • Back button should be modified to remove last filter applied (as if adding the URL params are like going to a new page)
  • Selecting facets will refresh the page.

Questions

  • I provided JS interaction for handling sub-facets and indeterminate checkboxes. Necessary?

    Answer

    This can be avoided without a patch.

    • If a checkbox pattern has a follow-up, remove the following attributes:
      • aria-controls
      • data-follow-up
      • aria-expanded
    • For the checkbox's corresponding follow-up, remove the following attributes
      • id
      • hidden - though this is applied when not showing on the page if including in the DOM
    • here is the code for displaying an indeterminate checkbox: <input class="sba-c-checkbox sba-c-checkbox--indeterminate" id="refer_someone_else" type="checkbox" name="review_type">
  • Do I need to provide interactions for adding and removing pills? No, page will refesh
  • Do I need to provide a script for attaching URL params? No, page will refresh
  • Do I need to provide interactions and UI for TypeAhead or is that included in the elastic search tool? Yes
  • How will we handle accessibility for all these interactions? No, page will refresh
  • How do we go about adding the spinner for infinite scroll and applying filter No needed. page will refresh.
